techmeme.title: The Shein India app, launched by Mukesh Ambani's Reliance Retail in partnership with Shein, has struggled to gain traction after launching in February (Rest of World)
Japanese carrier Docomo is discontinuing its emoji set, which was last updated in 2013 and became one of the most influential in history after its debut in 1999 (Keith Broni/Emojipedia)
A look at the rise of "sovereign AI", wherein countries invest directly in chip companies like Nvidia and AMD, making AI chips a highly politicized business (Dan Gallagher/Wall Street Journal)
Metaverse startup Infinite Reality, which claims a $15B+ valuation, told shareholders it is rebranding as Napster, an "AI-powered digital experiences" provider (Phoebe Liu/Forbes)
Utah-based Awardco, which makes HR software that helps AT&T, Adobe, and other clients manage employee rewards, raised a $165M Series B at an over $1B valuation (Ryan Barwick/Axios)
